alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Hot Spring; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:41AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clark, Pike, southeastern Montgomery and west central Hot Spring Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 740 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crater Of Diamonds State Park, or near Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro... Glenwood... Amity... Narrows Dam... Halfway... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Delight... Antoine... Billstown... Alpine... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Salem in Pike County... Welsh... Shawmut... Rosboro... Pike City... Hollywood... Nathan... Pisgah... Kirby... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for western and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Hot Spring; Pike
